text: phir hurmath wale mahino ke guzarte hee mushriko ko jahan pao qatl karo unhe giraftar karo,un ka muhaasera karlo aur un ki taak mein har ghaati mein ja baito,haan agar wo tauba karle aur namaz ke paband ho jae aur zakath ada karne lage tuh tum un ki raahe chohd do,yaqinan Allah tala baqshne wala meherban hai
